title: No liability is accepted for improper access to your personal information.

tosdr.tldr: Unfortunately, no security system can be guaranteed to be 100% secure. Accordingly, we cannot guarantee the security of your information and cannot assume liability for improper access to it.

topics.description: Once a service has your personal data, how much control do you have over how it will be used and how long?
